## Our Team

We are a group of graduate students working horizontally to host professional development, social, and outreach events, oftentimes with [UCSB's SACNAS Graduate Chapter](https://www.ucsbsacnasgrad.org/). We also form part of the American Indian & Indigenous Graduate Student Alliance.
